body:
I modified this issue to track specifically the issue of go/build support
for the vendoring experiment.

As the vendoring experiment is going to be enabled by default in Go 1.6,
I think go/build support is also in order.

Label this Go1.6Early.

Once this is done, we can vendor the go/build package temporarily
into x/tools so that gorename/goimports could benefit Go 1.5 users.
